page.title: 07WATER IN A HOUSE: L'BORO
page.content: There are two stop cocks,one outside and one inside.Water enters the house via the inside stop cock.It is piped to the cold water tank after supplying the kitchen. Two pipes come off the cold water tank.One supplies the taps upstairs and both toilets.The second goes to the immersion heater.There are three pipes coming off the immersion.The first supplies hot water for the bathroom and kitchen.The other pipes both go to the boiler.There is a pipe going off the main supply to the central-heating water-tank.A pipe comes from this tank,goes to the boiler to heat the water and then to all the radiators in the house.There is a pipe coming off the cold water supply to the taps and toilets,which feeds back to the cold water tank.
